text.div:
This value set contains 4 concepts

DeviceMetricCalibrationState

Describes the state of a metric calibration

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/metric-calibration-state

CodeDefinition
not-calibrated The metric has not been calibrated.
calibration-required The metric needs to be calibrated.
calibrated The metric has been calibrated.
unspecified The state of calibration of this metric is unspecified.

name: DeviceMetricCalibrationState
description: Describes the state of a metric calibration

concept.definition: The metric has not been calibrated.
The metric needs to be calibrated.
The state of calibration of this metric is unspecified.
